paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data and functional studies.

functional_data.summary: Three of the six variants exhibited functional impairments while three were biophysically similar to wild-type channels.

variants.additional_notes: Functional impairments were noted for variants R273Q and K897T/R954C.
key_quotes: Three of the six variants exhibited functional impairments while three were biophysically similar to wild-type channels.
R273Q and K897T/R954C generated currents resembling the rapid component of the cardiac delayed rectifier current (IKr) but with significantly diminished amplitude.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant was explicitly mentioned in the text.
